name: PRISONER 17
description:
Prisoner 17 is a dynamic first-person action platformer (In Death Run mode). In which you have to play the role of a prisoner who got a chance at redemption. Pass all the tests and get the freedom you deserve.

Run and overcome deadly traps, destroy killer drones, go through the mazes, use a jetpack to double jump on special levels, act decisively.

- More than 70 types of traps and their various combinations.
- Nice Sci-Fi soundtrack.
- 20 long levels with different traps.
- Traps of varying difficulty.
- Beautiful tropical environment.
- With each new level, the game becomes more difficult.
- Set your own time records.
